titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1939 LEROLLE, Guillaume 83 rue de Lille
1y 1v a 200 dep 50 Jan 19 Pepys Diary Feb 17 (Roget's thesaurus put aside ordered Jan 27) Feb 17 Pepys Wheatley: vol II Mar 2 June 23 Gone with the wind Oct 23! send to Mme t. de Poncheville
Monsieur Lerolle has a deposit of 50 frs which he left when he subscribed 1940 Feb 23 tamerlane, Lamb March 12 (left at A.M.'s) subsc finished, dep 50v left (account for books all paid off) 1940 Oct 31 Letters of TE Lawrence Nov 22 Nov 22 Piers Ploughman Jan 24 Gosse's English Literature Jan 24 Jan 24 Pickwick Papers 2 vols Feb. 18 Feb. 18 Magic Island Mar 13 March 16 Story of Fanny Burney May 8 Madame D'Arblay's Diary vol I April 17 April 17 Great Victorians May 24 April 24 Brief Candles June 11 April 24 Death of the Heart June 11 will send 400 frs for 1 yr 8 1/2 subsc P.T.O
LEROLLE to Jan 19 1942 Sub ren 1y 1v. Jan 19. 1940 - Jan 19. 1941 S Sub ren 1y 1v. Jan 19 1941 - Jan 19. 1942 400v pd. 400. May 26. 1941 June 11 Inheritance July 24 June 11 American Doctor's Odyssey July 24 July 24 Sleep in Peace Dec. 10 July 24 Northwest Passage Sept 30 July 31 American History (Woodward) Nov 24 31 Enbury Heath Nov 24 31 February Hill Oct. 14 31 Holy deadlock Nov. 24 31 George Washington Sept 30 Dec. 10 Whiteoaks.
